entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
